summary:
HM Inktober Day 23- Boggart: if not Dark Lord than what.
I’ve drawn clown Voldemort because I couldn’t look at clown reference...
body:
HM Inktober Day 23- Boggart: if not Dark Lord than what.

I’ve drawn clown Voldemort because I couldn’t look at clown reference pictures because they’re creepy AF but clown Voldemort is somehow better.

@yantarnii @yan-in-ktober

blog.name: the-butcher-of-plainfield-666
blog.title: Death is only the beginning 💀
blog.description:
💀 Explicit contents. Blog 18+
The only absolute knowledge attainable by man is that life is meaningless. | Italy, 30, male. In this blog you will find everything I love. | I love cinema (Tim Burton, Alfred Hitchcock, Guillermo del Toro, Stanley Kubrick, Quentin Tarantino and all movies of the Universal Classic Monsters). I love music (Marilyn Manson, Five Finger Death Punch, Alice Cooper, Nirvana, Imagine Dragons, Eminem, Lady Gaga and many others). I love comics, books, art and horror stuff. I adore Edgar Allan Poe and H. P. Lovecraft. | I'm not antisocial, I find only the most sincere books, the most insightful music, the freest writing and the most attentive photography. | I hate the human race. 💀

question: 51 Drarry
answer:
Number 51 : “Where am I going? Crazy. Wanna come?”

I’m a sucker for boys open with their feelings, calling each other boyfriends.

***


Harry was gritting his teeth so hard he might have bit his tongue at some point. He made eye contact with Ron across the table who rolled his eyes in agreement. Cormac McLaggen had been talking for the last ten minutes, and Harry had fantasized about strangling him for the last nine and a half. Every sentence leaving his mouth were either dull or hateful.

“Honestly that’s all girls want. Show them you’ve got a bit of money that you’re not scared to spend on her and she’ll be all over you. How do you think I managed to score two thirds of the Gryffindor girls?”

Harry was either punching him or leaving, and out of respect – and fear- for Madam Pince, he chose to gather his stuff and walked out. Halfway out of the library, Draco joined him.

“Harry, where are you going? Are you done with that History of Magic essay yet?”

“Where am I going?” Harry whispered furiously. “Crazy. Wanna come?”

Draco frowned at him but Harry was to busy pushing the door open to give him an explanation. He only stopped when Draco’s hand landed on his shoulder. He grabbed it, trying to find comfort in Draco’s warm skin.

“Cormac McLaggen is a finished wanker. He thinks he’s above everything.”

“Tell me about it,” Draco asked, and Harry did.

“Sounds like a tosser, all right,” Draco concluded. “Want to get revenge on him ? I’ve got some experience in pissing off Gryffindor boys.”

Harry snorted and shook his head.

“It’s fine, but thank you, Draco. I love you.”

“I love you too,” his boyfriend answered and gave him a kiss.

reblog.comment:
Number 51 : “Where am I going? Crazy. Wanna come?”

I’m a sucker for boys open with their feelings, calling each other boyfriends.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

title: Effervescent

read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2yXl7dZ

by Orahime

Join Holly Potter as she lives her life without a Dark Lord breathing down her neck or a prophecy over her shoulders. Will she be able to find her soulmate when she enters Hogwarts?

Words: 4704, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of Effervescence

blog.name: tomarrywritingprompts
blog.title: Tomarry/Harrymort Writing Prompts
blog.description: All Tomarry and Harrymort prompts and inspiration! Anyone is free to use these prompts for their work, and if you do make something, add a link in a reblog! I'll promo it!

summary: Prompt: Daemons AU. All humans have daemons. Most wizard daemons settle while they are at Hogwarts, so there are loads which are...
body:
Prompt: Daemons AU. All humans have daemons. Most wizard daemons settle while they are at Hogwarts, so there are loads which are similar to the house mascots, like many slytherins get snake daemons and loads of gryffindors get cat daemons, etc. The reason Voldemort is so unsettling isn’t because he looks inhuman, it is because creating horcruxes made his daemon look like an undead thing.

Alternative version. Harry is Tom Riddle’s daemon.

blog.name: rachelundefined
blog.title: RachelUndefined
blog.description:
Who am I? Can anyone really answer that question? I don't know who I am. I'm undefined.

What am I into? My biggest, but by no means only, passion is HP fanfics. My interests are many and varied, and my posts reflect my diversity.

Will our interests correspond? Only you can answer that question. Or will you, like myself, remain undefined?

title: This Time by Amanuensis
description:
Title: This Time
Author: Amanuensis
Fandom: Harry Potter

blog.description: Greetings babes. I’m Anastasia. I have a special place in my heart for both Shakespeare and Harry Potter. Icon by @risuniku. If you need something tagged that I don't already tag let me know and I will do so.

summary:
Ravenclaw: Gryffindor, can you get me some water since you’re already up?
Gryffindor: You have legs.
Ravenclaw: I can’t drink my...
body:
Ravenclaw: Gryffindor, can you get me some water since you’re already up?

Gryffindor: You have legs.

Ravenclaw: I can’t drink my legs.
